subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Indians beat the Twins to secure home field for Wednesday’s wild-card play-in game. The Rays and the Rangers also won, forcing a game Monday to decide the final wild-card berth.
snippet: The Indians beat the Twins to secure home field for Wednesday’s wild-card play-in game. The Rays and the Rangers also won, forcing a game Monday to decide the final wild-card berth.
